properties.entry: SELECT THEATER_NO, THEATER_NAME, THEATER_ADDR, MAP_LINK, LOCATION_NAME FROM TB_THEATER JOIN TB_LOCATION USING(LOCATION_CODE) ORDER BY THEATER_NO ASC
SELECT THEATER_NO, THEATER_NAME, THEATER_ADDR, MAP_LINK, LOCATION_NAME FROM TB_THEATER JOIN TB_LOCATION USING(LOCATION_CODE) WHERE LOCATION_NAME = ? ORDER BY THEATER_NO ASC
SELECT THEATER_NO, THEATER_NAME, THEATER_ADDR, MAP_LINK, LOCATION_NAME FROM TB_THEATER JOIN TB_LOCATION USING(LOCATION_CODE) WHERE THEATER_NAME LIKE '%'||?||'%' ORDER BY THEATER_NAME ASC
SELECT THEATER_NO, THEATER_NAME, THEATER_ADDR, MAP_LINK, LOCATION_NAME, THEATER_UPDATE FROM TB_THEATER JOIN TB_LOCATION USING(LOCATION_CODE) WHERE THEATER_NO = ?

SELECT MOVIE_NO, THEATER_NAME, FILE_PATH, CHANGE_NAME, THEATER_ADDR, MOVIE_TITLE, MAP_LINK FROM TB_SCREEN JOIN TB_MOVIE M USING(MOVIE_NO) JOIN TB_THEATER USING (THEATER_NO) JOIN TB_ATTACHMENT USING(MOVIE_NO) WHERE THEATER_NO = ? AND M.STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 GROUP BY MOVIE_TITLE,FILE_PATH,CHANGE_NAME,MOVIE_NO,THEATER_NAME,MAP_LINK ORDER BY MOVIE_NO;
SELECT THEATER_NO, THEATER_NAME, THEATER_ADDR, MAP_LINK, LOCATION_CODE, THEATER_UPDATE FROM TB_THEATER ORDER BY THEATER_NO DESC
SELECT MOVIE_NO, CHANGE_NAME FROM TB_ATTACHMENT JOIN TB_MOVIE USING(MOVIE_NO) WHERE MOVIE_NO = ?
